protein.specific_function: Active on elastin and collagen substrates

go_class.description: oxidoreductase activity, acting on the ch-nh2 group of donors
oxidoreductase activity, acting on the ch-nh2 group of donors, oxygen as acceptor

reference.reference_text: Kenyon K, Modi WS, Contente S, Friedman RM: A novel human cDNA with a predicted protein similar to lysyl oxidase maps to chromosome 15q24-q25. J Biol Chem. 1993 Sep 5;268(25):18435-7.
